qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Newport General Hospital and Parker City Hospital, what is the occupation of patients V. Lewis and E. Cruz?
qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Newport General Hospital, patient V. Lewis is a retired teacher; according to the hospitalization records of Parker City Hospital, patient E. Cruz is also a retired teacher.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Newport General Hospital, patient V. Lewis is widowed; according to the hospitalization records of Parker City Hospital, patient E. Cruz is also widowed.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Newport General Hospital, patient V. Lewis is allergic to penicillin; according to the hospitalization records of Parker City Hospital, patient E. Cruz is also allergic to penicillin.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Newport General Hospital and Parker City Hospital, what past surgeries have patients V. Lewis and E. Cruz undergone?

content: Surgery and Trauma History: Appendectomy at age 30, otherwise unremarkable.
Surgery and Trauma History: Appendectomy at age 25

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Newport General Hospital, patient V. Lewis had an appendectomy at age 30; according to the hospitalization records of Parker City Hospital, patient E. Cruz had an appendectomy at age 25.

qa_multi_document_compare.question: According to the hospitalization records of Newport General Hospital and Parker City Hospital, who was admitted earlier, V. Lewis or E. Cruz?
qa_multi_document_compare.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Newport General Hospital, V. Lewis was admitted on July 23; according to the hospitalization records of Parker City Hospital, E. Cruz was admitted on April 12. Therefore, E. Cruz was admitted earlier.
